column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bailiff says : " Councilman Sokka will now deliver the verdict . "
#Text=Sokka says : " In my years , I have encountered people born with rare and unique bending abilities .
#Text=" Lin says : " Chief .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " Lin .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Have you news of Avatar Korra ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We do .
#Text=You kidnapped her , Tarrlok !
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " I am shocked you would accuse me of such an evil act !
#Text=I already explained : Equalists attacked us and took her !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But there were no chi blockers here last night .
#Text=You planted the evidence , did n't you ?
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " That is a ridiculous accusation !
#Text=" Council page says : " It 's true !
#Text=He took her !
#Text=I was here when Avatar Korra arrived last night , but Councilman Tarrlok ordered me to leave .
#Text=I was on my way out when I saw Tarrlok bring her down to the garage .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " Say goodbye to Republic City , Avatar Korra .
#Text=You 'll never see it again .
#Text=" Tarrlok says : " That is nonsense !
#Text=Everyone knows you 're nothing but a squeaky - voiced liar !
#Text=" Lin says : " Why did you wait until now to ' fess up ?
#Text=" Council page says : " I was terrified to tell because ... Because Tarrlok is a bloodbender !
#Text=He bloodbent Avatar Korra !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Do n't make this worse for yourself .
#Text=Tell us where you have Korra .
#Text="
